author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Amazon Announces Plan To Open Sixth Ohio Fulfillment Center In West Jefferson
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc:
* AMAZON CONTINUES INVESTMENT AND GROWTH IN OHIO WITH NEW WEST JEFFERSON FULFILLMENT CENTER
* AMAZON.COM INC - NEW FACILITY WILL EMPLOY MORE THAN 1,500 FULL-TIME ASSOCIATES
* AMAZON - ANNOUNCED PLANS TO OPEN SIXTH OHIO FULFILLMENT CENTER IN WEST JEFFERSON, WHICH WILL CREATE MORE THAN 1,500 FULL-TIME POSITIONS BY END OF 2019
* AMAZON.COM INC - TO LAUNCH OPERATIONS AT FULFILLMENT CENTERS IN NORTH RANDALL AND MONROE BY END OF 2018, AND IN EUCLID IN 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
